Posts.Content: I have this knot in the middle part of my breast, not on my breast. not sure what it is. it seems hard but not sore. it is where the middle of your bra sits. What could this possibly be. 0 likes, 3 replies Report
Posts.Title: Knot in the middle not on breast

Posts.Content: Joette, The breastbone or sternum is in between your breasts. If you have any mass, you should have it evaluated immediately and biopsied. You didn't state your age, whether it was mobile (moveable,) and how large the mass is. Best Wishes, Merry Juliana Report
Posts.Title: Knot in the middle not on breast

Posts.Content: I'm 56 years old. It is not moveable. Report
Posts.Title: Knot in the middle not on breast

Posts.Content: It is about the size of a nickel. It is below my breast but in the middle. I will be making a appointment tomorrow. Report
